metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25651 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the SPICE file transfer protocol. File data from thehost system can end up in full or in parts in the client connection of anillegitimate local user in the VM system. Active file transfers from otherusers could also be interrupted, resulting in a denial of service. Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality as wellas system availability. This flaw affects spice-vdagent versions 0.20 andprior.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spice-vdagent - 0.20.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.20.0-1ubuntu0.1').
